name: Bomb Girl
description:
This is a platform jumping game. We want to use it to restore the feeling of the game on NES. However, in this game, we used more color than we expected. It made our game look like a modern game with pixel art.

Bomb girl tells a story that a girl can use bomb and she want to escape that world with full of monsters. The player will help her to across the obstacle and defeat monsters.

Group members:

Heino(me)-Designer&Programmer

Jason-artist

Kate-musician

Bryant-artist

Aki-artist

Thanks for all my partners!
